is there a website with base terminal co: - "net active"?  Not sure what that means.. mainly linux has fewer viruses because to do a lot of damage you need to run the virus as the root user.  By default more and more linux distros lock down the root account.  Additionally, Linux isn't as widespread on the desktop as Windows so fewer virus writers are presently targeting it </my two cents>
